tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This doctorr is a patient listner and then responds. He does not force his decision onthe  patient.  He explains various options and their consequences.when once the decision to surgey is taken he tells the prelimeneries to be taken care of before  getting admitted  into the hhospital  for surgery and other details as length of stay in the hospitalpost surgery etc
He performed left knee replacemrnt surgery  for my wife. she suffered  no severpain after surgery. she is able to walkabout  5 to ao minutes ithoutany supprt and is progressing wellNow it isjust a month and half she  is walkingfreely as her confidence allows.
we are quite satisfied with the doctor antor recommend him for orthopedic problems. why it is a responsible doctor who recommended him tome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: In addition to being a sincere professional with a very high level of integrity, Dr Arun Kannan happens to be one of the nicest people I have ever met. His diagnosis about my back was on point when I went to see him for the first time, and he could reassure me and my family that there was not much to be worried about at that point without sugar-coating the problems that could possibly arise in future, hence being honest about potential problems yet being kind and reassuring. He cares deeply about his work and about his communication with patients, and I would certainly encourage anyone with bone-related problems to visit him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Orthopedic Physiotherapy,Joint Dislocation Treatment,Total Hip Replacement,Joint Replacement Surgery,
review:
Recently I took my mother to Dr Arunkannan, He was very humble & Courteous, He was treating my mother’s Aged 70 years  for her  knee to be replaced second time . She had AF, urinery infection  & her ESR was very high. Most of the surgeon I counselled has not recommend for surgery with such High Risk condition & Age . My mother had a frozen Knee one day where she could not walk, Dr Arun took the Risk by having Necessary Back up & conducted surgery on the Right Knee successful which was frozen. 
My mother has recovered & with the confidence Dr Arun has given we replaced second retrofit kit in left knee as well , Now she is happy since the pain she had has completely gone off. Thanks DR Arun for giving me the confidence & a great outcome as per your recommendation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My experience with Dr. Kannan was a world away from previous experiences elsewhere. It was so good *** **** **** * *** *** **** ******** **********
He explain me so well about my treatment. I was welcomed with friendly staff and they were very helpful in his clinic. He is very nice, caring and friendly nature. I felt him as my family member and never worried about my treatment. Not even a month I started to go for my work. I would like refer for ortho problems ** ** *** ***** I feel blessed to have my treatment under him. 

Thank You.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother  had a severe pain in her  knees after she consult the doctor she is perfectly alright....The doctor was humble in asking about the problem...He also treated very well and also was very caring in the patient's recovery...He was so polite and caring.... Thank you Dr.Arun kannan, jayam Ortho care ,kodambakkam , Chennai.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
Dr Arun comes across as a super friendly doc. A young and dynamic doc, and is absolutely thorough in his inspection. Gave me pills that are needed to calm the pain. 

The best part- he inspected my knee even before reading the results of my MRI to get a better understanding of the problem himself. Thank you Dr Arun!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Arun regarding my daughter's medical condition. Doctor was very receptive and considerate. He has promised to talk to his colleagues and asked me to call him within the next 3'days. I am very hopeful of a solution and his attention and treatment for my daughter.

tags: None
review:
He is very young and dynamic.
6 years before  knee ACL operation done in  other hospital, but getting pain always.
In chennai most senior doctors suggest to do ACL revision,but
Dr.Arun kannan has identified the problem due to metal button which used in operation is rubbing the knee cap,if removed that 90%problem will resolve.
Thanks for patiently watching and gave the good suggestion.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went for ACL Reconstruction and Meniscus, The way sir treat the Patients was  very good ,Sir was listening the problem and clearing all type of doubts of patients in cool Manner. Because of these patients will get more Positive energy and boost up their confidences. He did the Sugery very well. I will recommend sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Really I'm very much thankful to doctor,becoz I was suffered from chronic low back pain I consulted many doctors but it was of no use, I was unable stand or walk for at least five minutes,but after consulting  Arunkannan doctor now I'm feeling much better, really I thank doctor from my bottom of my heart. I am recommending doctor to my friends and family members .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am C.S.Lakshmi, had Knees pain and my Dr. S. Ramakrishnan, Apollo clinic, Anna Nagar referred to Dr. Arunkannan, who after seeing my Knees X-ray at Apollo Hospital, Greams Road had decided for Knee replacements and we also agreed. The operation was done on July3, at Apollo Spectra Hospital, MRC Nagar. Even though my right leg ligament was little damaged, he had done surgery successfully. We are very much grateful to him who is always seeing the patients with a smile . A great Doctor whom you can refer any ortho problems.

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hi! Im Joyce !!
Recently my Mom was ill due to her Frozen Shoulder on her right side, was unable to move her hand by anyways for last 3 months. I visited Dr. Arun Kannan at his Clinic. Dr. Arun prescribed medicines **** ********* and the way Doc treated my  Mom was really understanding with Patience and was ready to explain all her doubts medically. Its been a month, my Mom is able to move her right hand- Shoulder freely and is able to do her regular activities without any discomfort. As a daughter, Im really thankful to you!
Thank You Dr. Arun Kannan!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My experience with Dr.Kannan was  a world away from previous expriences elsewhere. It made me feel that I was in safe hands and I had my successful surgery done of my leg and not even a month I started to walk with support and go for my work. I was truly impressed when he expalined me so well about my treatment and surgery how it will be done. I felt that I got the best possible treatment.
I appreciated their follow up & willingness to answer to all my questions.
I liked his  kindness, friendly, caring one doctor should have with the patients. 
I highly recommend a visit to him for ortho problems.

Thank You Doctor.
